name: Four's Number House (A Baldina's Basis Mod)
name_original: Four's Number House (A Baldina's Basis Mod)
description:
Story: X has realized that Four have not been around for a while so, X went to find Four. And then he found a school and Four is the owner! And Four likes playing games becuz he hid 8 Notes All around the school and wants you (X) to find all of them then recite the right poem to win! But it's not easy cuz Pen, Golf Ball, Spongy and the others Including Four are here to annoy you and give you a hard time. And when Four gets you in his  "Game of hide and seek" he'll [{{|{|{K}||{{I|:|L{|{|{||L|{|{|{|{Y{{_+|O|{"}{{U<>>><...

Charcters:

Four (Baldina)

Pen (Principal)

Golf Ball (Zauchka)

Flower (Bully)

Spongy (Guard)

Ruby (Cleaner/Janitor)

Pin (Cheerleader)
